text:
Three persons including a retired Special Sub Inspector were arrested on the charges of intimidating a manager of a private company here on Friday.

The arrested were Retired SSI Balasubramani, Thetthupatti councillor Muthu Pandi and Bharathi of Kannivadi.

The police said the trio encroached upon a 1.5-acre land owned by a Chennai-based firm at Seelapadi near Dindigul. When the firm manager Saminathan questioned them about the encroachment of the company land, all three persons reportedly threatened to murder him.

Acting on a complaint by Saminathan, the police arrested all the three persons. They are also in search of seven others in this connection.
title: Three arrested
